website_summaries.verdict: A snazzy hybrid ukulele that connects to Bluetooth keyboard via an LED fretboard.
pros: Fretboard shows beginners how to do everything from playing songs to the proper way you need to hold the ukulele
Learn how to play in just 15 minutes
Quality and sound produced is impressive
cons: App may be hard to load on some smart devices

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, looks like quality and the learning interface is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nicely made instrument, especially considering the very reasonable cost — and then there’s the bonus of such an amazing learning interface. I’ve been trying to learn an instrument my entire life. It seems I’ve tried everything. But this is so simple and easy. The bluetooth settings latched onto the ukulele immediately. The videos were clear and not too much to take in at once. And then...I was playing. Everything works perfectly, like magic. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: whereverigo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, no app on Amazon Appstore?
customer_reviews.text: Just started with this, it is a lot of fun, but I'm taking a star off because the app was difficult to load on my Amazon Fire tablet. If the app was available for download for the Fire tablet, I would give it 5 starts. Very good quality instrument, and I thought bag that came with the accessories pack was unexpectedly high quality. the search yields: We didn't find results for "populele" in Apps & Games. Since I bought this for use with the app, not having the app on the Amazon store is a concern. (note: The app runs fine on my Fire tablet, it is simply not available to download as one normally would from the Amazon Appstore)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift that combines technology with creativity
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my (almost) teenage daughter. It slowly shifts her attention from her phone or iPad towards something more creative. Right out of the box the Populele sound amazing. Tuning it was a breeze with the help of the app. The many songs on the library are all famous hits of her generation. She spent the entire first day playing her populele. Just small breaks for charging - which was relatively quick. Great idea. I think I may get one myself
customer_reviews.author: vladytom

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ukulele and I purchased this smart ukulele because I like the idea that it could help me learn to play. The quality of the instrument as well as the packaging really impressed me. This is made to a much much higher standard than my friend’s cheaper ukulele. This does not feel like a toy, it is a real instrument. The app has been great for me in learning and I haven’t had any glitches like some other reviewers have stated. And the song library has a lot of popular songs. This is a great ukulele and I would recommend it to anyone that is interested in learning to play.
customer_reviews.author: Chris05

customer_reviews.title: Great Uke that is fun to learn!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far! It works great and it is super fun to play! I have had no issues with the app or the bluetooth, and as long as you are in a reasonably quiet room, it picks up the notes great!
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: I’m pretty sure this is the only way I’m ever going ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure this is the only way I’m ever going to learn how to play, the app makes it super easy to learn chords quickly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie Meeks

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a plast
customer_reviews.text: It’s all good . Had me playing with the first song . Also it’s a plast at parties. Everyone wants to have a try.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Flag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, ukulele comes in nice package and good quality! Whole family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: GoldCracker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! The ukulele is in great quality! I got mine yesterday, I can play one song now!
customer_reviews.author: Angla_0924

customer_reviews.title: Too small for big fingered/handed adults
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but was just too small to use for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about music, but this makes it easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Populele! Only had it a week but it’s helping me learn how to switch chords.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Sounds good. Easy to get going with the app. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Matthews

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shipped so fast! Well packaged - very protected. Just as described. It's so much fun to play! The app is like guitar hero for the uke!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Quailty of build is good..
customer_reviews.text: Quailty of build is good... nice little instrument but the blue tooth technology is not as good... I have only been able to connect once after trying many times to my android.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy lee way

customer_reviews.title: I love this ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I love this ukulele. When I ordered it I thought it came with a capo, bag to store in and an extra string, All that came with was the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Great way to help kids or adults learn an instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Great little uke! It is well made and has a good sound and feel. It connects well to ipad and iphone and the lights are a great help at picking up chords when you first start. My 10 year old and 8 year old really enjoy the game aspect of learning and chord lights, it makes practice something they enjoy. I just wish there were more songs and more depth to the app, and it would be great to have multiple users and time tracking for each users. But overall I highly recommend it for young and old.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Populele is pretty great! The only issue I have had is ...
customer_reviews.text: Populele is pretty great! The only issue I have had is if you're not close to the mic sometimes the app doesn't recognize that you are playing the correct notes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i just watched a video about this on vat19. i am thinking about getting one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: E. Manos

product_meta.title: Popuband Populele Smart Ukulele - LED Fretboard, Bluetooth Connection Free app for iOS and Android - Includes In-app Chords Game, Video lessons and Tuner for Beginners (Populele Only)
feature_bullets: WORLD’S FIRST SMART UKULELE. An exciting hybrid of craftsmanship, tech, and fun, Populele will change the way you learn music. The Populele’s 72-LED fretboard connects via Bluetooth with the Populele app to show you exactly how to play your favorite songs. Beginners get a quick way to start their musical journey, and experienced ukulele players can take their repertoire to the next level. This smart uke is made with premium European maple, first-class spruce, and Italian Aquila strings

CHORD & SONG LIBRARY. Interact with the LED keys on the fretboard to learn exactly where your fingers go. Visit our continuously updated library of popular songs. Built-in recording enables you to share your songs with friends

GAME MODE & IN-APP TOOLS. Designed specifically for beginners, the sound-responsive technology enables users to get real-time feedback and correction. Light up your performance! As your environment gets louder, the 72 LEDs on the Populele fretboard shine brighter. This sound-responsive light technology is sure to mesmerize your audience. In-app tools teach yourself to tune your ukulele and more with Populele’s in-app tools.
DAZZLE MODE & CUSTOMIZE PATTERN. Program patterns of light to shine as you play. Totally independent of chords, you can create funky patterns or even letters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
